questions.question: Henry Moseley's periodic table was an improvement to the periodic table designed by earlier scientists because Moseley's

choices.answer: was arranged to show periodicity of chemical properties
was arranged to show the increase of ionic size

questions.question: The best explanation for the organization of Mendeleev's Periodic Table by atomic mass rather than atomic number is that

choices.answer: atomic mass is unrelated to the chemical reactivity of elements
He organized the table prior to the discovery of the atomic #
different isotopes of elements have different atomic masses
atomic numbers are not affected by the chemical reactivity of elements

questions.question: Which statement best describes Moseley's contribution to the modern Periodic Table?

choices.answer: Recognizing that elements have similar properties
Predicting the properties of missing elements
Providing a basis for ordering elements

questions.question: Which of the following would change the current theory of the atom?

choices.answer: electrons found on an 8th energy level
a carbon atom being discovered with 12 neutrons
a new subatomic particle is discovered

questions.question: Which model was developed after alpha particles were bombarded onto sheets of gold?
Which model of the atom was used as a result of JJ Thomson's cathode ray experiments?
Which statement is true comparing the research of Bohr, Rutherford, and Dalton?

choices.answer: Dalton & Bohr modeled their experiments & their theories after Rutherford
Rutherford & Bohr modeled their experiments & their theories after Dalton

questions.question: Which of the following statements is most accurate regarding atoms?

choices.answer: Most atoms cannot combine with other atoms.
Chemical reactions divide atoms into smaller units.
Atoms of the same element may have different atomic (mass) numbers.

questions.question: Li has an ionization energy of 520 kJ/mol. F has an ionization energy of 1680 kJ/mol. Why?

choices.answer: Fluorine has strong attractive forces between the nucleus and the electrons
Lithium has a smaller atomic radius than fluorine.

questions.question: Ionization or ionisation is the process by which an atom acquires a negative or positive charge.
ionization energy does this across the periodic table...
Shielding causes low ionization across a period.
As atomic radius increases, ionization energy___
Who did the Gold Foil Experiment?

choices.answer: Half the distance between 2 identical nuclei atoms.
Half the distance half a cell
Half the distance of the earth
